entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
